item.description:
Hi Scott and Donna, Please invite the Worcester Alliance of Photographers. Date and Time: Saturday, April 28, 2012, 7:00 PM Location: Holden Senior Center 1130 Main St, Holden, MA Travel North on Rte 122A in Holden. Travel past the Senior Center on your right. At the lights in the center of Holden take a right on Rte 31 N. Bascom Pkwy is the first street on your right. Take Bascom Pkwy to the Senior Center parking. This is a judged competition with the 4 other camera clubs, Fall River, Quinebaug, Photosociety of Rhode Island and Northern Rhode Island Camera Club.  We have been photographing 25 topics for this competition beginning last May and through April 2012.  The competition will have the five clubs' best digital images for each subject projected on five screens at the same time.  The judges will rank each set of images. Our judges are Donna Dufault and Scott Erb. The event is free and open to the public. Multiscreen Subject Categories for 2011 - 2012

Animal(s)
Antique
Architecture
Autumn mood
Boat Yard
Construction
Days of Thunder
Dreamy
Family
Foggy
Food
Glamour
Graduation
HDR
Horsing around
Mood
Oops
Puddle(s)
Rhode Island
Store front
Sunrise/Sunset
Tension
Tower(s)
Twilight
Water Thanks, JoAnn Audette
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the ones having fun and raising the roof!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Seven Hills Camera Club Presents Multiscreen 2012
